title: The time has sadly come for a Nordic nuclear weapon
summary_full: Nordic countries have a lot to lose, which brings the political responsibility to discuss “nuclear what-ifs”. These governments must have the courage for this public debate precisely because they can afford the independent nuclear deterrence needed today
